blocks.name: tagAlbum
blocks.description: Tag an album using a list of user supplied tags.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: sessionKey
args.info: A session key generated by authenticating a user via the authentication protocol.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name.

args.name: album
args.info: The album name

args.name: tags
args.info: A comma delimited list of user supplied tags to apply to this album. Accepts a maximum of 10 tags.

blocks.name: getAlbumInfo
blocks.description: Get the metadata and tracklist for an album on Last.fm using the album name or a musicbrainz id.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name.

args.name: album
args.info: The album name

args.name: mbid
args.info: The musicbrainz id for the album

args.name: autocorrect
args.info: Transform misspelled artist names into correct artist names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist name will be returned in the response.

args.name: username
args.info: The username for the context of the request. If supplied, the user's playcount for this album is included in the response.

args.name: lang
args.info: The language to return the biography in, expressed as an ISO 639 alpha-2 code.

blocks.name: getAlbumTags
blocks.description: Get the tags applied by an individual user to an album on Last.fm. To retrieve the list of top tags applied to an album by all users use album.getTopTags.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name

args.name: album
args.info: The album name

args.name: mbid
args.info: The musicbrainz id for the album

args.name: autocorrect
args.info: Transform misspelled artist names into correct artist names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist name will be returned in the response.

args.name: user
args.info: If called in non-authenticated mode you must specify the user to look up.

blocks.name: getTopAlbumTags
blocks.description: Get the top tags for an album on Last.fm, ordered by popularity.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name

args.name: album
args.info: The album name

args.name: autocorrect
args.info: Transform misspelled artist names into correct artist names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist name will be returned in the response.

args.name: mbid
args.info: The musicbrainz id for the album

blocks.name: untagAlbum
blocks.description: Remove a user's tag from an album.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: sessionKey
args.info: A session key generated by authenticating a user via the authentication protocol.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name.

args.name: album
args.info: The album name

args.name: tag
args.info: A single user tag to remove from this album.

blocks.name: searchAlbum
blocks.description: Search for an album by name. Returns album matches sorted by relevance.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: album
args.info: The album name

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 30.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

blocks.name: tagArtist
blocks.description: Tag an artist with one or more user supplied tags.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: sessionKey
args.info: A session key generated by authenticating a user via the authentication protocol.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name.

args.name: tags
args.info: A comma delimited list of user supplied tags to apply to this artist. Accepts a maximum of 10 tags.

blocks.name: getArtistCorrection
blocks.description: Use the last.fm corrections data to check whether the supplied artist has a correction to a canonical artist

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name to correct.

blocks.name: getArtistInfo
blocks.description: Get the metadata for an artist. Includes biography, truncated at 300 characters.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name

args.name: mbid
args.info: The musicbrainz id for the artist

args.name: lang
args.info: The language to return the biography in, expressed as an ISO 639 alpha-2 code.

args.name: autocorrect
args.info: Transform misspelled artist names into correct artist names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist name will be returned in the response.

args.name: username
args.info: The username for the context of the request. If supplied, the user's playcount for this artist is included in the response.

blocks.name: getSimilarArtists
blocks.description: Get all the artists similar to this artist.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name

args.name: limit
args.info: Limit the number of similar artists returned

args.name: autocorrect
args.info: Transform misspelled artist names into correct artist names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist name will be returned in the response.

args.name: mbid
args.info: The musicbrainz id for the artist

blocks.name: getArtistTags
blocks.description: Get the tags applied by an individual user to an artist on Last.fm. If accessed as an authenticated service /and/ you don't supply a user parameter then this service will return tags for the authenticated user. To retrieve the list of top tags applied to an artist by all users use artist.getTopTags.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name

args.name: mbid
args.info: The musicbrainz id for the artist

args.name: autocorrect
args.info: Transform misspelled artist names into correct artist names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist name will be returned in the response.

blocks.name: getTopArtistAlbums
blocks.description: Get the top albums for an artist on Last.fm, ordered by popularity.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name

args.name: mbid
args.info: The musicbrainz id for the artist

args.name: autocorrect
args.info: Transform misspelled artist names into correct artist names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist name will be returned in the response.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

blocks.name: getTopArtistTags
blocks.description: Get the top tags for an artist on Last.fm, ordered by popularity.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name

args.name: mbid
args.info: The musicbrainz id for the artist

args.name: autocorrect
args.info: Transform misspelled artist names into correct artist names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist name will be returned in the response.

blocks.name: getTopArtistTracks
blocks.description: Get the top trags for an artist on Last.fm, ordered by popularity.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name

args.name: mbid
args.info: The musicbrainz id for the artist

args.name: autocorrect
args.info: Transform misspelled artist names into correct artist names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist name will be returned in the response.

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

blocks.name: untagArtist

args.name: sessionKey

blocks.name: searchArtist
blocks.description: Search for an artist by name. Returns artist matches sorted by relevance.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 30.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

blocks.name: getMobileSession
blocks.description: Create a web service session for a user. Used for authenticating a user when the password can be inputted by the user. Accepts email address as well, so please use the username supplied in the output. Only suitable for standalone mobile devices. See the authentication how-to for more. You must use HTTPS and POST in order to use this method.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: secretKey
args.info: A Last.fm shared secret key.

args.name: username
args.info: The last.fm username or email address.

args.name: password
args.info: The password in plain text.

blocks.name: getSession
blocks.description: Fetch a session key for a user. The third step in the authentication process. See the authentication how-to for more information.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: token
args.info: The authentication token received at your callback url as a GET variable.

args.name: secretKey
args.info: A Last.fm shared secret key from dashboard.

blocks.name: getTopArtistsChart
blocks.description: Get the top artists chart

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

blocks.name: getTopTagsChart
blocks.description: Get the top artists chart

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

blocks.name: getTopTracksChart

args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

blocks.description: Get the most popular artists on Last.fm by country

args.name: country
args.info: A country name, as defined by the ISO 3166-1 country names standard

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

blocks.name: getTopTracksByCountry
blocks.description: Get the most popular tracks on Last.fm last week by country

args.name: country
args.info: A country name, as defined by the ISO 3166-1 country names standard

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

blocks.name: getUserArtists

args.name: user
args.info: The user whose library you want to fetch.

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number you wish to scan to.

args.name: tag

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

args.name: tag

args.name: limit

blocks.name: getTopTagTracks

args.name: tag

args.name: limit

args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

blocks.name: getWeeklyTagChartList
blocks.description: Get a list of available charts for this tag, expressed as date ranges which can be sent to the chart services.

args.name: tag
args.info: The tag name

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

blocks.name: tagTrack
blocks.description: Tag an album using a list of user supplied tags.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: sessionKey
args.info: A session key generated by authenticating a user via the authentication protocol.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name.

args.name: track
args.info: The track name

args.name: tags
args.info: A comma delimited list of user supplied tags to apply to this album. Accepts a maximum of 10 tags.

blocks.name: getTrackCorrection
blocks.description: Use the last.fm corrections data to check whether the supplied track has a correction to a canonical track

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name to correct.

args.name: track
args.info: The track name to correct.

blocks.name: getTrackInfo
blocks.description: Get the metadata for a track on Last.fm using the artist/track name or a musicbrainz id.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: mbid
args.info: The musicbrainz id for the track

args.name: track
args.info: The track name

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name

args.name: username
args.info: The username for the context of the request. If supplied, the user's playcount for this track and whether they have loved the track is included in the response.

args.name: autocorrect
args.info: Transform misspelled artist and track names into correct artist and track names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist and track name will be returned in the response.

blocks.name: getSimilarTracks
blocks.description: Get the similar tracks for this track on Last.fm, based on listening data.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: track
args.info: The track name

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name

args.name: mbid
args.info: The musicbrainz id for the track

args.name: autocorrect
args.info: Transform misspelled artist and track names into correct artist and track names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist and track name will be returned in the response.

args.name: limit
args.info: Maximum number of similar tracks to return

blocks.name: getTrackTags
blocks.description: Get the tags applied by an individual user to a track on Last.fm. To retrieve the list of top tags applied to a track by all users use getTopTrackTags.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: track
args.info: The track name

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name

args.name: mbid
args.info: The musicbrainz id for the track

args.name: autocorrect
args.info: Transform misspelled artist and track names into correct artist and track names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist and track name will be returned in the response.

args.name: user
args.info: If called in non-authenticated mode you must specify the user to look up

blocks.name: getTopTrackTags
blocks.description: Get the top tags for this track on Last.fm, ordered by tag count. Supply either track & artist name or mbid.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: track
args.info: The track name

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name

args.name: mbid
args.info: The musicbrainz id for the track

args.name: autocorrect
args.info: Transform misspelled artist and track names into correct artist and track names, returning the correct version instead. The corrected artist and track name will be returned in the response.

blocks.name: loveTrack
blocks.description: Love a track for a user profile.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: sessionKey
args.info: A session key generated by authenticating a user via the authentication protocol.

args.name: track
args.info: A track name (utf8 encoded)

args.name: artist
args.info: An artist name (utf8 encoded)

blocks.name: untagTrack
blocks.description: Remove a user's tag from a track.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: sessionKey
args.info: A session key generated by authenticating a user via the authentication protocol.

args.name: track
args.info: A track name (utf8 encoded)

args.name: artist
args.info: An artist name (utf8 encoded)

args.name: tag
args.info: A single user tag to remove from this track.

blocks.name: scrobbleTracks
blocks.description: Scrobble a batch of tracks.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: secretKey
args.info: A Last.fm shared secret key.

args.name: sessionKey
args.info: A session key generated by authenticating a user via the authentication protocol.

args.name: scrobbleData
args.info: Scrobble data. See README for more info.

blocks.name: scrobbleSingleTrack
blocks.description: Scrobble a track.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: secretKey
args.info: A Last.fm shared secret key.

args.name: sessionKey
args.info: A session key generated by authenticating a user via the authentication protocol.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name.

args.name: track
args.info: The track name.

args.name: timestamp
args.info: The time the track started playing, in UNIX timestamp format (integer number of seconds since 00:00:00, January 1st 1970 UTC). This must be in the UTC time zone.

args.name: album
args.info: The album name.

args.name: context
args.info: Sub-client version (not public, only enabled for certain API keys)

args.name: streamId
args.info: The stream id for this track received from the radio.getPlaylist service, if scrobbling Last.fm radio

args.name: chosenByUser
args.info: Set to 1 if the user chose this song, or 0 if the song was chosen by someone else (such as a radio station or recommendation service). Assumes 1 if not specified

args.name: trackNumber
args.info: The track number of the track on the album.

args.name: mbid
args.info: The MusicBrainz Track ID.

args.name: albumArtist
args.info: The album artist - if this differs from the track artist.

args.name: duration
args.info: The length of the track in seconds.

blocks.name: searchTracks
blocks.description: Search for a track by track name. Returns track matches sorted by relevance.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: track
args.info: The track name

args.name: artist
args.info: Narrow your search by specifying an artist.

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 30.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

blocks.name: unloveTrack
blocks.description: UnLove a track for a user profile.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: sessionKey
args.info: A session key generated by authenticating a user via the authentication protocol.

args.name: track
args.info: A track name (utf8 encoded)

args.name: artist
args.info: An artist name (utf8 encoded)

blocks.name: updateNowPlayingTrack
blocks.description: Used to notify Last.fm that a user has started listening to a track. Parameter names are case sensitive.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name.

args.name: track
args.info: The track name.

args.name: sessionKey
args.info: A session key generated by authenticating a user via the authentication protocol.

args.name: album
args.info: The album name.

args.name: context
args.info: Sub-client version (not public, only enabled for certain API keys)

args.name: mbid
args.info: The MusicBrainz Track ID.

args.name: albumArtist
args.info: The album artist - if this differs from the track artist.

args.name: duration
args.info: The length of the track in seconds.

blocks.name: getUserArtistTracks
blocks.description: Get a list of tracks by a given artist scrobbled by this user, including scrobble time. Can be limited to specific timeranges, defaults to all time.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: user
args.info: The last.fm username to fetch the recent tracks of.

args.name: artist
args.info: The artist name you are interested in

args.name: startTimestamp
args.info: An unix timestamp to start at.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

args.name: endTimestamp
args.info: An unix timestamp to end at.

blocks.name: getUserFriends
blocks.description: Get a list of the user's friends on Last.fm.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: user
args.info: The last.fm username to fetch the friends of.

args.name: recenttracks
args.info: Whether or not to include information about friends' recent listening in the response.

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

blocks.name: getUserInfo
blocks.description: Get information about a user profile.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: user
args.info: The user to fetch info for.

blocks.name: getUserLovedTracks
blocks.description: Get the last 50 tracks loved by a user.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: user
args.info: The user name to fetch the loved tracks for.

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

blocks.name: getUserPersonalTags
blocks.description: Get the user's personal tags.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: user
args.info: The user who performed the taggings.

args.name: tag
args.info: The tag you're interested in.

args.name: taggingtype
args.info: The type of items which have been tagged. Valid values: `artist`, `album`, `track`.

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

blocks.name: getUserRecentTracks
blocks.description: Get a list of the recent tracks listened to by this user. Also includes the currently playing track with the nowplaying=`true` attribute if the user is currently listening.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: user
args.info: The last.fm username to fetch the recent tracks of.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

args.name: from
args.info: Beginning timestamp of a range - only display scrobbles after this time, in UNIX timestamp format (integer number of seconds since 00:00:00, January 1st 1970 UTC). This must be in the UTC time zone.

args.name: extended
args.info: Includes extended data in each artist, and whether or not the user has loved each track. Valid values `0` or `1`.

args.name: to
args.info: End timestamp of a range - only display scrobbles before this time, in UNIX timestamp format (integer number of seconds since 00:00:00, January 1st 1970 UTC). This must be in the UTC time zone.

blocks.name: getUserTopAlbums
blocks.description: Get the top albums listened to by a user. You can stipulate a time period. Sends the overall chart by default.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: user
args.info: The user name to fetch top albums for.

args.name: period
args.info: overall | 7day | 1month | 3month | 6month | 12month - The time period over which to retrieve top albums for.

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

blocks.name: getUserTopArtists
blocks.description: Get the top artists listened to by a user. You can stipulate a time period. Sends the overall chart by default.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: user
args.info: The user name to fetch top albums for.

args.name: period
args.info: overall | 7day | 1month | 3month | 6month | 12month - The time period over which to retrieve top albums for.

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

blocks.name: getUserTopTags
blocks.description: Get the top tags used by this user.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: user
args.info: The user name

args.name: limit
args.info: Limit the number of tags returned

blocks.name: getUserTopTracks
blocks.description: Get the top tracks listened to by a user. You can stipulate a time period. Sends the overall chart by default.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: user
args.info: The user name to fetch top tracks for.

args.name: period
args.info: overall | 7day | 1month | 3month | 6month | 12month - The time period over which to retrieve top tracks for.

args.name: limit
args.info: The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.

args.name: page
args.info: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

blocks.name: getUserWeeklyAlbumChart
blocks.description: Get an album chart for a user profile, for a given date range. If no date range is supplied, it will return the most recent album chart for this user.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: user
args.info: The last.fm username to fetch the charts of.

args.name: from
args.info: The date at which the chart should start from.

args.name: to
args.info: The date at which the chart should end on.

blocks.name: getUserWeeklyArtistChart
blocks.description: Get an artist chart for a user profile, for a given date range. If no date range is supplied, it will return the most recent artist chart for this user.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: user
args.info: The last.fm username to fetch the charts of.

args.name: from
args.info: The date at which the chart should start from.

args.name: to
args.info: The date at which the chart should end on.

blocks.name: getUserWeeklyChartList
blocks.description: Get a list of available charts for this user, expressed as date ranges which can be sent to the chart services.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: user
args.info: The last.fm username to fetch the charts list for.

blocks.name: getUserWeeklyTrackChart
blocks.description: Get a track chart for a user profile, for a given date range. If no date range is supplied, it will return the most recent track chart for this user.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: A Last.fm API key.

args.name: user
args.info: The last.fm username to fetch the charts of.

args.name: from
args.info: The date at which the chart should start from. See User.getWeeklyChartList for more.

args.name: to
args.info: The date at which the chart should end on.
